actions.text: On agreeing to the Schiff amendment (A026) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A026) offered by Mr. Schiff.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Schiff amendment (A026) Agreed to by voice vote.

description: An amendment numbered 26 printed in Part B of House Report 116-154 to require the National Counterintelligence and Security Center to carry out an annual report on the influence operations and campaigns in the United States conducted by the Russian Federation.
purpose: An amendment numbered 26 printed in Part B of House Report 116-154 to require the National Counterintelligence and Security Center to carry out an annual report on the influence operations and campaigns in the United States conducted by the Russian Federation.
